parameter.label: Space Name
parameter.tooltip: The name of the space to provision

parameter.label: Requester Name
parameter.tooltip: The name of the person who requested the space

parameter.label: Requester Email
parameter.tooltip: The email of the person who requested the space

result.name: Login Link
result.tooltip: Link to login and reset password

parameter.label: Unallocated Key
parameter.tooltip: The Company Name to use when searching for unallocated Spaces. (ie UNALLOCATED-TECHBAR)

parameter.label: Space Name
parameter.tooltip: What to rename the space to

parameter.label: Default Locale
parameter.tooltip: The default locale to set the Space to

parameter.label: Default Timezone
parameter.tooltip: The default timezone to set the Space to

parameter.label: Tries
parameter.tooltip: The number of tries this process has run

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Username
parameter.tooltip: The unique username for the user.

parameter.label: Password
parameter.tooltip: The password for this user record.

parameter.label: Space Admin
parameter.tooltip: Should the user have space administration rights. (Yes / No)

parameter.label: Email
parameter.tooltip: The email address for this user record.

parameter.label: Display Name
parameter.tooltip: The display name for this user record.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Space slug of which the user you are trying to updates belongs to (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Current User Name
parameter.tooltip: User name of user you wish to update.

parameter.label: Display Name
parameter.tooltip: The displayName for the user.

parameter.label: Email
parameter.tooltip: The email for this user profile.

parameter.label: Preferred Locale
parameter.tooltip: The preferred language for the user, in the format languageabbreviation[_COUNTRYABBREVIATION]. Examples: en, fr, es, en_GB, es_MX

parameter.label: Enabled
parameter.tooltip: Select if this user profile will be enabled (boolean)

parameter.label: Password
parameter.tooltip: Reset password for a user.

parameter.label: Space Admin
parameter.tooltip: Select if you desire for this user to have space admin privledges.(boolean)

parameter.label: New Username
parameter.tooltip: Change the username for this user.

parameter.label: Append or Replace attributes?
parameter.tooltip: Append or replace the existing attribute values with the attributes provided.

parameter.label: Attributes
parameter.tooltip: Change the attributes for this user. JSON formatted string: [{"name": "Attribute Name","values": ["Attribute Value","Attribute Value",...]},{"name": "Attribute Name2","values": ["Attribute Value",...]},...]

parameter.label: Profile Attributes
parameter.tooltip: Change the profile attributes for this user. JSON formatted string: [{"name": "Profile Attribute Name","values": ["Profile Attribute Value","Profile Attribute Value",...]},{"name": "Profile Attribute Name2","values": ["Profile Attribute Value",...]},...]

parameter.label: Append or Replace memberships?
parameter.tooltip: Append or replace the existing memberships with the memberships provided.

parameter.label: Memberships
parameter.tooltip: Change the memberships (e.g. teams) for this user. JSON formatted string: [{"team": {"name": "Facilities"}}, {"team": {"name": "Engineers"}},...]

task.name: Set Admin Name and Email on Datastore

parameter.label: Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to update

parameter.label: Updated - Core State
parameter.tooltip: The submissions core state

parameter.label: Updated - Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: The page to set the submission to

parameter.label: Updated - Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: The direction of the next page (next or previous)

parameter.label: Updated - Values JSON
parameter.tooltip: A JSON representation of the submissions values

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Domain/Server
parameter.tooltip: server/domain this space is on

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being deleted from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Type of Record to Delete
parameter.tooltip: Type of record you want to delete. Valid Values are: Space, Kapp, Bridge, Bridge Model, Categories, Form, Form Type, Team, User, Webhook, Security Policy Definition, Datastore Form.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Please Specify the Kapp if deleting Submission, Form, Form Type, or Categories

parameter.label: Item Name or Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug (or name if slug not appropriate for the item) of the item you are deleting.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Form to find submissions in.

parameter.label: Index To Search
parameter.tooltip: The Index definition to search (i.e. values[Name],values[Status])

parameter.label: Core State
parameter.tooltip: Searches for submissions that have a core state that matches this parameter. If no value is provided, the results will contain submissions in all core states.

parameter.label: Direction
parameter.tooltip: Result Set sorting direction. The default value is ascending.

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: Limit the number of results returned. If not provided, the server will limit the results to 25 submissions. Maximum limit 1000

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: Query to use to fetch submissions. (i.e values[First Name]="Fred")

parameter.label: Next Page Token
parameter.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the page of submissions to return. The submission that matches this value will not be included in the results.

parameter.label: Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to update

parameter.label: Updated - Core State
parameter.tooltip: The submissions core state

parameter.label: Updated - Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: The page to set the submission to

parameter.label: Updated - Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: The direction of the next page (next or previous)

parameter.label: Updated - Values JSON
parameter.tooltip: A JSON representation of the submissions values

parameter.label: Login Link
parameter.tooltip: Link to login and reset password

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Space Slug of Allocated Space
